EINSTEIN PERSONALIZATION
Install the Einstein Personalization Ingestion API Data Stream

When you install the Ingestion API data stream that’s in the Einstein Personalization data kit bundle, the data model objects are automatically made available and mapped.

In Data Cloud, on the Data Streams tab, click New.
Select Installed Data Kits & Packages and click Next.
Select the data space for the Ingestion API data stream.
Select PersonalizationBundleIngestAPI.
Make sure that PersonalizationLog-Personalization is also selected.
Click Next.
Click New Connector, name the connector PersonalizationLog, and click Save.
Click Next.
To view the data stream details, click Next.
Click Deploy.
Open the PersonalizationLog-Personalization data stream.
To view the DLO to DMO mappings, click Review in the Data Mapping area.
